org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.enumeration

Interface StageAssignmentTraversal.StageSplittingCriterion

  • Enclosing class:
    StageAssignmentTraversal
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface StageAssignmentTraversal.StageSplittingCriterion
    Criterion to futher split InterimStage besides precedence.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean shouldSplit(ExecutionTask producerTask, Channel channel, ExecutionTask consumerTask)
      Tells whether two adjacent ExecutionTasks of the same current InterimStage should be placed in different ExecutionStages.

    • Method Detail

      • shouldSplit

        boolean shouldSplit(ExecutionTask producerTask,
                    Channel channel,
                    ExecutionTask consumerTask)
        Tells whether two adjacent ExecutionTasks of the same current InterimStage should be placed in different ExecutionStages.
        Returns:
        true if the ExecutionTasks must be separated, false if it is not necessary
